explains: n. 专门小组成员；专题讨论小组参加者（等于 panellist）

sentences.en: Now it's your time to ask questions on any or all of the panelist.
sentences.cn: 现在大家可以问问题了,可以问所有的嘉宾。

sentences.en: As an invited keynote panelist, I prepared myself by reviewing the latest research and best practices on this theme.
sentences.cn: 作为小组成员应邀演讲，我查阅了于此主题相关的最新研究和最佳做法。

sentences.en: At sites where a panelist resided, a volunteer ran a second SL viewer to assist in the operation of the panelist's avatar.
sentences.cn: 在专家小组成员所在的站点上，有一个志愿者运行一个第二sl查看器以协助专家小组成员的角色运作。
